SEARCH
Package utility

Class Medication

java.lang.Object
utility.Medication
public class Medication extends Object
Represents a medication in the inventory system, including its name, stock level, low stock threshold, and a low stock alert status. Provides methods to manage stock updates and interact with a CSV file for persistence.
Since:
2024-11-21

  • Constructor Details

    • Medication

      public Medication(String medicationName, int stock, int lowStockValue)
      Constructs a new Medication instance.
      Parameters:
      _medicationName - the name of the medication
      _stock - the initial stock level
      _lowStockValue - the stock threshold for triggering a low stock alert

  • Method Details

    • updateStock

      public static boolean updateStock(String medicationName, int amount, boolean isAddition)
      Updates the stock of a medication by adding or removing the specified amount. Updates are persisted to the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      medicationName - the name of the medication to update
      amount - the amount to add or remove
      isAddition - true to add stock, false to remove stock
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • getMedicationName

      public String getMedicationName()
      Gets the name of the medication.
      Returns:
      the name of the medication

    • getStock

      public int getStock()
      Gets the current stock level of the medication.
      Returns:
      the current stock level

    • isLowStockAlert

      public boolean isLowStockAlert()
      Checks whether the medication is under a low stock alert.
      Returns:
      true if the medication stock is below or equal to the low stock threshold, false otherwise

    • getLowStockValue

      public int getLowStockValue()
      Gets the stock threshold that triggers a low stock alert.
      Returns:
      the low stock threshold

    • addStock

      public void addStock(int amount)
      Adds stock to the medication and updates the low stock alert status.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount of stock to add

    • removeStock

      public void removeStock(int amount)
      Removes stock from the medication and updates the low stock alert status. Ensures the stock does not drop below zero.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount of stock to remove

    • updateLowStockLevel

      public void updateLowStockLevel(int newLimit)
      Updates the low stock threshold and recalculates the low stock alert status.
      Parameters:
      newLimit - the new low stock threshold

    • updateLowStockAlert

      public void updateLowStockAlert()
      Updates the low stock alert status based on the current stock and low stock threshold.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the medication in CSV format.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string containing the medication name, stock, and low stock value separated by semicolons
